description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa's work spans various topics including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, internet fragmentation, and sustainability. His blog posts and courses explore concepts like the global village, shanzhai innovation, and collaborative practices. yeehaa's approach emphasizes breaking down silos, fostering collaboration, and embracing diversity in both digital and physical spaces.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforms education, advocates inclusive internet. Explores decentralization, sustainability, collaboration. Blends philosophy, tech for innovative solutions.
